attributes.action: Cancel his plans to support England at Saturday's World Cup Final
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brown is demonstrably no friend of England , and his reported plann is a hypocritcal attempt to use English Rugby for cheap Political ends in the same way that used British Servicemen a fortnight ago. What is more ,we the English will not be fooled by it.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
